name: Fish Motel
description:
Fish Motel!

You are a proud owner of a fish motel!

…but you built the motel in a fishless pond!

Help the fish get across the dry land and check into your motel!

…You must keep them alive!

Controls

  • Arrows to move
  • Space to pickup/throw water
  • Click Start/Next Level to begin level
Debrief

Wanted to do a bit more - add stuff to buy between levels like a bucket (instead of solo cup) to water fishies or upgrade motel occupancy or amenities.  Really, I didn't get to all the in between level stuff including much time to create the level report.

Though, I am super happy with this.  This is the first time I've made my own audio for a game.  I also didn't spend a ton of time on this.  Last game jams I started right at the beginning and went up to the end.  I probably spent more around 7-9 hours on this.

Also, didn't get to add the different control options.
